DOC.HEAD: London Stocks Slightly Higher at Midday
DOC.TEXT: Stock prices in London were slightly higher at midday Friday, but trading volume remained thin ahead of Christmas. Traders took heart from the market's upward move, which was achieved despite a weak showing earlier in Tokyo. At about noon in London, the Financial Times-Stock Exchange 100-share index was up 7.4 points, or 0.3 percent, at 2,360.4, also its morning high. Volume came to 264.6 million shares at midday, compared with 235 million shares at the same time Thursday.
